question: 団扇
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>group</kanji> of <kanji>folding fan</kanji>s, no matter how big it gets, is still a <vocabulary>fan</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
The reading for <ja>団</ja> is an exceptional reading. It's the same as <ja>内</ja>'s reading so you can think about how a group of folding fans to make a big fan is just a bunch of fans inside of fans.

The reading for <ja>扇</ja> is also an exceptional reading. Imagine a <reading>wa</reading>lrus (<ja>わ</ja>) using the <ja>内</ja> fan.
